name: Unaided: 1939
description: Unaided: 1939 is a hardcore Top-Down shooter with stealth elements, set in the year 1939 before the start of World War II. Germany has not yet attacked Poland but tensions have already risen in central Europe.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: 2.0 GHz+ Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 550 / Radeon 6850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit or newer Processor: 2.4 GHz+ Dual Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 760 / Radeon 7850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
